sub_title: Associate General Manager, Editorial Services @ MPS | I am in the Netherlands with work authorization and available to join immediately
summary:
Results-oriented Associate General Manager, Editorial Services with 12+ years of experience hiring new talent, onboarding, retaining, and growing existing editors. Skills include strategic thinking, driving creativity, ideation, and problem-solving.

Analytical and detail-oriented copyeditor with 10+ years of experience editing scientific content for clients, such as Nature Publishing Group, Blackwell, Wolters Kluwer, Emerald, Cambridge University Press, Intellect, ACS, and Wiley.

profile_positions.description:
• Managing a team of 40+ copyeditors based in Bangalore, Chennai, and Dehradun
• Leading a team of managers and R&F staff in achieving the organization's goals
• Formulating and implementing policies, procedures, and standards, and implementing and managing customer support and technical services support models that bring resolution
• Evaluating and apprising employees and providing regular feedback for continuous improvement
• Proactively working to solve customer’s critical issues, promoting a value-driven framework, filling in the operational gaps through extensive operational expertise, and managing multiple priorities simultaneously
• Developing ranking methodology to establish project implementation priorities aligned with business strategies and requirements
• Problem-solving skills with impeccable attention to detail with an ability to set overall strategy, drive process improvement with operational excellence, and vendor scorecard excellence
• Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to collaborate and build a consensus in a high-pressure environment
• Ensuring that departmental decisions and project plans, such as staffing, development, organization, material efficiency, hardware acquisitions, and facilities are in line with the organization’s business plan and vision
• Developing high-performance individuals at different levels with pragmatic relationship-building skills
• An individual with strong interpersonal, problem-solving, and analytical skills, to develop ideas that produce bottom-line results
• Analyzing, developing, and recommending plans and solutions to exceed client’s expectations
• Identifying and facilitating training and professional development opportunities for staff to support skill development
• Promoted as Associate General Manager in April 2021
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager Editorial Services

profile_positions.description:
• Managed a team of 40+ copyeditors based in Bangalore, Chennai, and Dehradun
• Hired and set up a team of copyeditors in Dehradun from scratch to transition the work from Bangalore as part of the company’s restructuring plan
• Traveled to Dehradun to conduct feedback sessions, refresher training, brainstorming sessions, and tool training
• Hired and built a pool of freelancers to handle language and copyediting tasks for various clients
• Mentored and trained copyeditors (Team Leaders) in my team to handle various accounts independently, thus supporting them in their career aspirations
• Set measurable performance goals, create personal development plans, have career growth conversations, provide feedback on employee performance, and conduct annual performance reviews of copyeditors
• Mentored and guided quality leads/process experts to manage quality, improve process efficiency, and minimize variations
• Collaborated with the Technology team to improve workflows, tool development, and style sheet automation
• Managed end-to-end production activities for CAMBRIDGE, Intellect, and Wolters Kluwer clients along with the project managers
• Coached copyeditors on editing proficiency and quality by participating in peer reviews and providing actionable feedback
• Proficient in data-driven decision-making by using a variety of reports and dashboards to assess the team’s performance and identify bottlenecks or inefficiencies
• Guided the Quality team to develop corrective action plans based on the feedback received from the clients
•	Conducted brainstorming sessions and derived action items to improve the team’s performance, trust, communication, accountability, ownership, respect, and so on
profile_positions.title: Assistant Manager, Editorial Services and Operations

profile_positions.description:
• Led a team of 30+ copyeditors for BLACKWELL
• Trained the copyeditors on new style points and level of intervention needed for different types of journals
• Edited sample documents that helped acquire new journals
• Prepared simplified house style guides for quick reference
• Coordinated with the client for clarification on style-related issues and for understanding the client’s requirements and updated style guides accordingly
• Provided weekly feedback and arranged discussion sessions to improve understanding of client requirements
• Trained new joiners on copyediting, language editing, and customer-specific style points
• Trained freelancers on internal editing tools and updated them on style and language points
• Coordinated with language freelancers and copyeditors about allocating work, tracking production, and ensuring timely delivery
• Coordinated with different teams (for example, pre-editing, graphics, and pagination) in the workflow to ensure timely delivery
• Escalated and helped resolve issues with editing tools and provided feedback and suggestions for updating editing tools based on the customer requirement to the software development team
• Allocated files to team members based on availability and targets and maintained daily production reports
profile_positions.title: Team Lead

profile_positions.description:
• Copyedited scientific/medical journals to ensure sense, continuity, grammar, spelling, style, accuracy, and consistency
• Referred to various guides, such as AMA, APA, MLA, Chicago, and so on for copyediting
• Ensured compliance of the edited document with journal-specific style
• Edited and validated flow charts, diagrams, and other graphic layouts
• Edited references following different reference-editing guidelines (for example, Harvard and Vancouver) and managed citations in the text
• Instrumental in transitioning offline copyediting to online copyediting by coordinating with all the key stakeholders
profile_positions.title: Associate Copyeditor
